column.name: id
column.description: A unique identifer

column.name: name
column.description: Full path to folder

column.name: type
column.description: COMPONENT, GRAPH, CONNECTION, or AGENT

column.name: create_time
column.description: Timestamp when this entry was created.

column.name: create_by
column.description: The user who last updated this entry.

column.name: last_update_by
column.description: The user who created this entry.

column.name: last_update_time
column.description: Timestamp when a user last updated this entry.

column.description: INTEGER, STRING, LONG, BOOLEAN, DECIMAL, ENUM, COMPLEX, SEQUENCE

column.description: Must be filled out when type is COMPLEX or SEQUENCE
